title: Urgency Detection
original_prompt:
Extract all the sentences or keywords which are of urgent importance. Analyze the provided content and then classify the sentences into urgent with the score and keywords in JSON format

{content:I was billed twice for the service and this is the second time it has happened. Can you please look into this matter right away?}
input1: {content: I have received multiple notifications about my account being compromised, and I need immediate assistance to secure it. Additionally, my recent transactions show unauthorized charges that require urgent attention.}
input2: {content: The shipment of my medication has been delayed, and I cannot afford to miss my dosage. Please expedite the process as this is critical for my health. Furthermore, I have a meeting scheduled for tomorrow that requires urgent preparation due to new developments.}
